entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C
